titles.title: 031 Father To Thee A Joyful Song We Raise

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Father to Thee a joyful Song we raise
With all Thine own
And in Thy presence sound A note of praise
To Thee alone

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Bro't nigh bro't Home to Thee
O wonderous grace
That gives us now with
Thine own Son our place

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
How deep the holy joy That fills that scene
Where love is known
Thy love our God And Father
Now is seen in Him alone

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
As in the holy calm Of Thine own rest
He leads the praise of those Thy love has blessed

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He leads the praise
How precious to Thine ear
The song He sings
How precious too to Thee
How near how dear are Those He brings

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
To share His place 'twas Thus that Thou didst plan
Thou lovedst Him before The world began
